welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Echelon, the charming city known for its rich history and welcoming atmosphere. We invite you to explore our vibrant community and experience all that Echelon has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at PHL, serving primarily domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The largest terminal at PHL, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A medium-sized terminal at PHL, serving primarily domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: A medium-sized terminal at PHL, serving primarily domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: The newest terminal at PHL, serving primarily international flights.

wifi.note: Connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions to access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Philadelphia Airport serves domestic flights and houses a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at North Philadelphia Airport serves international flights and offers customs and immigration services for international travelers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free. Some areas may have limited coverage.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Wings Field Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and includes check-in counters, baggage claim, and boarding gates.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and charter flights, providing a comfortable and exclusive experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Millville Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Millville Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
